hero.title: Hi, I'm Sidharth Khurana!
hero.des0: I am an adobe and linkedin certified designer
hero.des1: I enjoy designing human centric, minimal interfaces and interactions
hero.des2: With a strong passion for design thinking, motion design, storytelling and natural interactions.
hero.des3: I am also currently learning Machine Learning & Data Science.
